header.text: Baby Dev Studio is a unique place for parents and babies to feel safe, strengthened and connected! We provide both parents and their babies with resources to enhance physical, sensory and social development.

intro.text: We are a very special family business that puts parents and babies at the center of our attention and care. Our groups are small and personal. We offer our services to parents from the seventh month of pregnancy until their babies are walking.
We are a one-of-a-kind place that offers you a mixture of preventative and fun care.

services.title: Welcome, New World - Babies aged 0-3 months
services.subtitle: Infant development private workshop

description.text: Learn how to help your baby achieve their motor milestones
Work on/gain knowledge about head-holding, muscle tone, tummy time, preferred side, etc.
Assess and prevent developmental delays
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

notes.text: Usually, 3-4 lessons are needed to cover all the exercises, depending on the motor development of the infant and the needs/wishes of the parents to learn more ways to help their baby.

services.title: Rolling Is Fun - Babies aged 3-7 months
services.subtitle: Infant development private workshop

description.text: Learn how to help your baby achieve their motor milestones
Gain knowledge about rolling to both sides, spinal alignment, muscle tone, tummy time, preferred side, etc.
Assess and prevent developmental delays
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

notes.text: Usually, 3-4 lessons are needed to cover all the exercises, depending on the motor development of the infant and the needs/wishes of the parents to learn more ways to help their baby.

services.title: Crawling: It’s Time to Move On - Babies aged 5-12 months
services.subtitle: Infant development private workshop

description.text: Army Crawl - Learn how to help your baby achieve their motor milestones
Gain knowledge about forward pulling, muscle tone, tummy time, etc.
Assess the brain-ligaments connection and prevent developmental delays
Regular Crawl - Learn how to help your baby achieve their motor milestones
Gain knowledge about maintaining the crawling position on six body points, rocking, symmetrical movement, shoulder belt strength, muscle tone, etc.
Assess the brain-ligaments connection and prevent developmental delays
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

notes.text: Usually, 4-6 lessons are needed to cover all the exercises, depending on the motor development of the infant and the needs/wishes of the parents to learn more ways to help their baby.

services.title: Sitting All By Myself - Babies aged 6-12 months
services.subtitle: Infant development private workshop

description.text: Learn how to help your baby achieve their motor milestones

Gain knowledge about getting in and out of the sitting position independently, symmetrical movement, shoulder belt strength, muscle tone, feet that often point or flex, sitting in a “W” shape, balance during independent sitting, fine motor skills, etc.
Assess the brain-ligaments connection and prevent developmental delays
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

notes.text: Usually, 1-2 lessons are needed to cover all the exercises, depending on the motor development of the infant and the needs/wishes of the parents to learn more ways to help their baby.

services.title: Walking Toward My Future - Babies aged 10-20 months
services.subtitle: Infant development private workshop

description.text: Learn how to help your baby achieve their motor milestones

Gain knowledge about getting in and out of the standing position independently, cruising ability, symmetrical movement, muscle tone, foot position, balance during independent standing and walking, fine motor skills, etc.
Assess the brain-ligaments connection and prevent developmental delays
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

notes.text: Usually, 1-2 lessons are needed to cover all the exercises, depending on the motor development of the infant and the needs/wishes of the parents to learn more ways to help their baby.

services.title: Bonding Without Words - Babies aged 0-5 months
services.subtitle: Infant massage private workshop

description.text: Babies who experience skin-to-skin contact interact more with their caregiver and cry less
Massaging the baby makes them feel safe and helps them be calmer and happier
Massage increases bonding between the baby and their caregiver
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

services.title: Tummy Time the Right Way - Babies aged 0-4 months
services.subtitle: Infant development private workshop

description.text: This hands-on exercise helps babies learn to like being on their tummy because they are in the right position. Not every tummy position helps baby strengthen their shoulder blades. Tummy time is the foundation for all of baby’s motor development
Hands-on session
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor

services.title: Be Prepared - Pre-birth, from 7 months pregnant until birth
services.subtitle: Infant development pre-birth private workshop

description.text: For parents who feel a bit clueless, insecure or unsure of what to do when the due date arrives
Prepare yourself to give your new baby a relaxed and knowledgeable parent from the beginning of their life. You’ll learn with a baby doll how to hold your baby, how to soothe them and much more.
Hands-on session with a doll baby
Baby, parents/primary caregiver and instructor
